attributes.action: Naionalize Northen Rock & structure it to run Credit Card Agreements for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Imagine the improvements in transparency of valid Civil Service expenses.

Give MP's (at first) Special HM Credit/Debit Cards RUN BY THE NORTHERN ROCK as a by product 

Whilst also providing low cost mortgages agreements financed by a Government Gaurunteed Bonds Sale.

There is no shame in a government applying the brakes to the rampant profiteering within the banking sector.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
